game.siege.villagers_vs_pillagers_enderp: Siege: Villagers vs Pillagers (with Ender Pearls)
game.siege.villagers_vs_pillagers_recapt: Siege: Villagers vs Pillagers (with Recapture & Ender Pearls)
game.siege.recapture.desc: In this mode, defenders can recapture previously captured points.
game.siege.enderpearl.desc: In this mode, defenders have ender pearls that allow them to teleport to points under siege.
